snippet: The two carriers will combine their wireless grids and build a new, superfast network to compete with the market leader, a joint venture of T-Mobile and France Télécom.
abstract: Telefonica and Vodafone will combine their wireless phone grids in Britain and jointly build a superfast network to keep pace with market leader Everything Everywhere, a joint venture of T-Mobile and France Telecom.
lead_paragraph: The two carriers will combine their wireless grids and build a new, superfast network to compete with the market leader, a joint venture of T-Mobile and France Télécom.

headline.seo: Telefónica and Vodafone to Combine Mobile Forces in Britain
headline.main: Two Carriers to Combine Mobile Forces in Britain
headline.print_headline: Two Carriers to Combine Mobile Forces in Britain
